biotools.summary: Open source software that offers the possibility to load and edit graphs, which may represent biological pathways or functional hierarchies. It allows to integrate different *omics data into the functional context and provides a variety of functions for data mapping and processing, statistical analysis, and visualisation.

bioschemas.name: VANTED
